Name: Decromancer
About the game: Decromancer is a unique tactical card battle game that focuses on a huge, story-based single-player campaign. Battles are fought by placing cards on a grid and attempting to deal enough damage to your opponent's empty slots. With each card having unique attack patterns and special abilities, the tactical possibilities are endless! ▶ Construct an army from a set of over 150 hand-painted cards, each with their own tactical advantages and special abilities. ▶ Explore a large, beautifully illustrated open world. ▶ Cast powerful spells to turn the tide of battle. ▶ Unlock new cards as you progress to supplement and improve your army. ▶ Victory in battle will allow you to upgrade your cards to Elite form, granting stat boosts and new abilities.
Meta Title: Decromancer: Oct 13, 2015, UNIT9 and Full Overview
